tweet: I think one reason a lot of people doesn't like lists is that it won't add to your follower count. People are ego centric.
@nicksak I believe Seesmic has support for lists (at least in some platforms). TweetDeck will have soon. I'm sure others will too.
@JesperBylund True. But it would also punish spam accounts. I think you're right though.
Actually, although twitter lists is a very recent feature I reach many more people that way than if I only count my followers.
I can see followers, native retweet and lists being used for a possible Twitterrank feature. What about age of Twitter account?
